thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com
thread.title: Jodie

author: Jodie
title: Jodie
text: Learning with E-Careers was a new way of learning for me and I definitely see the benefits of being able to learn at your own pace. Staff were always on hand to answer any questions and any issues were rectified promptly. The content taught in my course was thorough enough, however I do feel that the software used could be updated as it has some weaknesses. Overall pleased with the experience.
